definition: A structured activity involving physical exercises and drills specifically designed to improve skills and techniques related to a popular sport played with a spherical object. It is commonly practiced by individuals or teams to enhance their abilities and performance in this sport.

examples.english: I am going to soccer training.
The soccer training starts at 4 PM.

examples.german: Mein Bruder nimmt am Fußballtraining teil.
examples.english: My brother participates in soccer training.

examples.german: Das Fußballtraining findet auf dem Sportplatz statt.
examples.english: The soccer training takes place on the sports field.

examples.german: Wir machen beim Fußballtraining viele Übungen.
examples.english: We do a lot of exercises during soccer training.
